alert.note: Alert for Boone; De Kalb; McHenry (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:16PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern De Kalb, western McHenry and southeastern Boone Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 415 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Woodstock to near Genoa. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Woodstock around 420 PM CDT. Harvard around 445 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Union. Including the following interstate... I-90 between mile markers 31 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
